mapper.select: select r.REVIEWNO reviewno, r.USERNO userno,r.POSTNO postno,r.TITLE title, r.CONTENT content, r.REGDATE regdate, r.DELETEDDATE deleteddate,m.NICKNAME nickname,(select count(1) from helpful where reviewNo = r.reviewNo) as helpfulCnt from Review r LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON r.USERNO = m.USERNO where postNo=#{no} ORDER BY helpfulcnt desc,REGDATE DESC

SELECT r.POSTNO , r.TITLE , r.CONTENT , r.POSTIMG , r.REGDATE , r.DELETEDDATE , m.NAME , (select count(1) from USERLIKE where POSTNO = r.POSTNO) as UserLikeCnt, (select count(1) from USERLIKE where POSTNO = r.POSTNO and userNo =#{userNo} ) as UserCheck FROM post r LEFT JOIN enterprise m ON r.ENTERPRISENO =m.ENTERPRISENO WHERE postNo=#{no}
SELECT p.POSTNO , t.MATERIALNAME FROM POST p INNER JOIN MATERIALPOST m ON p.POSTNO = m.POSTNO INNER JOIN MATERIAL T ON m.MATERIALNO = t.MATERIALNO WHERE p.POSTNO=#{no}
SELECT count(*) FROM helpful WHERE userNo=#{userNo} AND reviewNO=#{reviewNo}
SELECT count(*)as UserCheck FROM UserLike WHERE userNo=#{userNo} AND postNo=#{postNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Review values( seq_review.nextval, #{userNo}, #{postNo}, #{title}, #{content}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM HELPFUL WHERE userNo=#{userNo} and reviewNo=#{reviewNo}
DELETE FROM userlike WHERE userNo=#{userNo} and postNo=#{postNo}
